name: Portola Hotel & Spa
description: Portola Hotel & Spa is a luxury waterfront hotel on Monterey's Old Fisherman's Wharf. Full-service spa, fine dining, and access to Monterey Peninsula golf courses including Pebble Beach and Spyglass Hill.
shortDescription: Luxury waterfront hotel on Monterey's Old Fisherman's Wharf with access to Pebble Beach area golf.
highlights: Waterfront location on Old Fisherman's Wharf
Minutes from Pebble Beach and Spyglass Hill

roomTypes.name: Classic Room
roomTypes.description: Comfortable rooms with garden or courtyard views.

roomTypes.name: Premium Room
roomTypes.description: Upgraded rooms with partial water views.

roomTypes.name: Suite
roomTypes.description: Spacious suites with separate living area.

faqs.question: How close is Portola to Pebble Beach?
faqs.answer: About 15 minutes to Pebble Beach, Spyglass Hill, and the Links at Spanish Bay.

faqs.question: Is Portola good for golf groups?
faqs.answer: Excellent — luxury waterfront lodging with great dining, plus easy access to the world-class Monterey Peninsula courses.
